data.name: Pge_Welcome.Content
data.value:
Welcome to KurobaChan Program Add wizard.
The wizard will help you to add a new external program to database, which window can be hidden and shown by KurobaChan.
If you're ready, click "Next".
Note: It is required to start the target program at least once for necessary information to be collected during wizard process. If you want to add a program that is not suitable to start in current environment (e.g. adding NSFW game in work environment), please close this wizard and wait for appropriate time to start again.

data.name: Pge_1SoftwareLocate.Content
data.value: Please select the location of the external program you want to add. If the specified program needs to run with Locale Emulator, the actual location of the program should be specified here. You will need to enable Locale Emulator support later.

data.name: Pge_1SoftwareLocate.LENotice
Pge_2LESupport.Content
data.value:
Locale Emulator is a tool that can run programs with different code page from current system's global code page by simulating region/language's code page environment. It is required to use Locale Emulator to run program with different code page (e.g. running native Japanese program with Shift-JIS(932) code page in Simplified Chinese environment). You need to download the tool here: https://github.com/xupefei/Locale-Emulator
If you need to use Locale Emulator to run this program, to prevent misjudging program's main window, you need to enable "Support for Locale Emulator". If your program does not need to use Locale Emulator, it is not recommended to enable this option.

data.name: Pge_2LESupport.CheckBox
data.value: Enable support for Locale Emulator (only for this program)

data.name: Pge_3WindowLocate.Content
data.value:
Time to start the target program. Please manually start the target program, and perform some operations (if needed) to make the program's main window visible.
When the main window is visible, please click the Button below to refresh the window list, and select the program's main window from the list. Wizard will highlight the selected window (for 2 seconds), and display the class name of the window in the text box below. (Bold row is the most possible main window)
If you're sure you selected the right window, click Next.

data.name: Pge_4WindowHookTest.Content
data.value:
Now we need to test the hotkey hook for the target program.
Please close the program completely and open it again. When the program is running, please click the button below, then press K in the target program main window.
If the text below show the title of the target window and the pressed 'K' key info, the hotkey hook is working.
Please notice that ONLY the hotkey hook is working can the wizard continue.

data.name: Pge_Complete.Content
Win_SoftwareAdd.Cancel
data.value: The program add wizard is not finished yet. Are you sure to quit wizard now?

data.name: Globals.Quit
data.value: Are you sure you want to quit KurobaChan? For safety reasons, all hidden windows will be shown before KurobaChan exits.
